oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Slide Collection - Bus Shelter at Memorial Square
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Nashville's central terminal for city buses was located on each side of Victory Memorial Square Park along Capitol Boulevard on the west and Sixth Avenue on the east. The Cotton States Building, the Andrew Jackson Hotel and the Elks Lodge are visible in this view from Capitol Boulevard. 35 mm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Victory Memorial Square Park
Architecture; Capital City
Nashville (Tenn.); Capitol Boulevard
